title: Discovery of a New Inhibitor for the YTH Domain-containing m6A RNA Readers

N6-methyladenosine (m6A) is an abundant modification in mammalian mRNAs and plays important regulatory functions in gene expression, primarily mediated through specific recognition by “reader” proteins. YTH family proteins are one...
